lead_paragraph: Days after the mayor of Caracas was arrested, Socialist Party legislators called Monday for an investigation of another opposition leader accused of conspiring against President Nicolás Maduro.

headline.main: Venezuela: Call for Inquiry on Politician Stirs Concerns of a Broader Crackdown
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: Call for Inquiry on Politician Stirs Concerns of a Broader Crackdown

snippet: Days after the mayor of Caracas was arrested, Socialist Party legislators called Monday for an investigation of another opposition leader accused of conspiring against President Nicolás Maduro.
